sentence.Network_en: He tried hard not to smile in smug self-satisfaction.

sentence.Network_en: Thomas and his wife looked at each other in smug satisfaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 托马斯和夫人得意地互相望了一眼。

sentence.Network_en: Exercise will give you a glow of satisfaction at having achieved something.
sentence.Network_cn: 运动将让你体会到一种有所成就的无比喜悦感。

(6)顾客满意度（customer satisfaction）(Customer Satisfaction)：指的是顾客比较其对P/S品质的‘期望’与‘实际感受’后，所感觉的一种愉悦或失望的程度。

lj.lj_ly: some amendments were made, not entirely to his satisfaction.
lj.lj_ls: 做了某些修正，但还没有达到使他满意的程度。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin satisfactio(n-), from satisfacere 'satisfy, content' (see satisfy). The earliest recorded use referred to the last part of religious penance after ‘contrition’ and ‘confession’: this involved fulfilment of the observance required by the confessor, in contrast with the current meaning 'fulfilment of one's own expectations'

entry.def: Satisfaction is the pleasure that you feel when you do something or get something that you wanted or needed to do or get.

example.ex: She felt a small glow of satisfaction...
Both sides expressed satisfaction with the progress so far...
example.tran: 双方对目前的进展都表示满意。

entry.def: If you get satisfaction from someone, you get money or an apology from them because you have been treated badly.

example.ex: If you can't get any satisfaction, complain to the park owner.
example.tran: 如果你得不到任何赔偿，向园区所有者投诉。

entry.def: If you do something to someone's satisfaction, they are happy with the way that you have done it.

example.ex: She never could seem to do anything right or to his satisfaction...
example.tran: 她似乎从没能做过一件正确或令他满意的事。

example.ex: It is hard to see how the issue can be resolved to everyone's satisfaction.
example.tran: 很难想象这个问题如何解决才能让每个人都满意。

means.word_mean: 1. the contentment you feel when you have done something right;

sentences.sentence: "the chef tasted the sauce with great satisfaction"

means.word_mean: 2. state of being gratified; great satisfaction;

sentences.sentence: "to my immense gratification he arrived on time"
"we were unable to get satisfaction from the local store"

means.word_mean: 4. act of fulfilling a desire or need or appetite;

sentences.sentence: "the satisfaction of their demand for better services"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的
令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+satisfactory令人满意的→adj.令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
satisfactory[adj.令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的]+ly表副词→satisfactorily满意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不满,不平,令人不满的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: dissatisfy[v.使感觉不满, 不满足]+action表名词→dissatisfaction不满,不平
satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]+action表名词→satisfy的名词→satisfaction满足,满意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使感觉不满, 不满足
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不+satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]→v.使感觉不满, 不满足

stems_affixes.value_cn: 满意,使满意,使相信,说服

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"达到的状态",由-fy转化而来

stems_affixes.word_buile: putrefy使腐烂+action达到的状态→n.腐坏,腐败
satisfy满意+action达到的状态→satisfy的名词形式

But of course there is also a kind of humorous satisfaction in seeing somebody self-important making a fool of themselves.

means.word_mean: 满意, 满足, 实现, 欣慰, 令人满意（或欣慰）的事

sentences.en: Swimming was one of her greatest satisfactions.
sentences.cn: 游泳是她最大的乐趣之一。

jushi.english: Your visit will be a great satisfaction to your friend.
jushi.chinese: 你的来访对你的朋友来说是非常高兴的事。

jushi.english: It's a satisfaction to know that he is well again.
jushi.chinese: 得悉他已痊愈,令人深感欣慰。

jushi.english: It was a great satisfaction for her to know that her son was doing so well at college.
jushi.chinese: 她得知儿子在大学里的情况很好而感到非常满意。
